## Calculator.addRate() method

Apply a rate to a value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static addRate(value: number, rate: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Base value to raise |
|  rate | number | Rate value to apply |

<b>Returns:</b>

number


## Example

We want to apply a VAT rate (20%) to a price (10â‚¬)

```
// Prints "12":
console.log(Calculator.addRate(10, 20));
```
